chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 Pro and it has the above problem.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

Your customer opened a service request and asked for a return. We went ahead and generated a return label for them. 

The customer requested a refund due to wrong grade.

f, as instructed, your customer shared pictures of the item before returning it, you'll find them in the “details” section of this service request.

When you receive the item, make sure you take the next step by the deadline in the Quality Charter.

Best regards,
Antonio from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request and the deadline. We will proceed with the refund soon.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their refund.

We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. 

Please use the "Report a Problem" button at the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 

iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Antonio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. 
Please do not proceed with the refund in the meantime.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
